class.name: LinearSolverSafe

javadoc.text: Ensures that any linear solver it is wrapped around will never modify * the input matrices.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

javadoc.param: alg The solver it is wrapped around.

the solver it is wrapped around
local copies of input matrices that can be modified.
